=== optimised (accmlation) ===
{{{
{ \/n n:-
 [fib 
 { \/x x, _, 1 :- x
 [] \/x \/y \/z z > 1 ? (x, y, z) :- fib[y, y+x, z-1]
 }]
 [1, 1, n]
}[10]
